traits.name: Water Breathing
entries: The eel can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The eel makes two bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 10 (2d6 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) lightning damage.

actions.name: Lightning Jolt {@recharge 5}
entries: One creature the eel touches within 5 feet of it outside water, or each creature within 15 feet of it in a body of water, must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On failed save, a target takes 13 (3d8 damage) lightning damage. If the target takes any of this damage, the target is {@condition stunned} until the end of the eel's next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned}.
